name: Hapebeast Rhythm
description:
A small game for the Hapebeast community, by TheOldCoiner#3245 (discord).

Play and screenshot your score at the end to compare with your fellow Hapes!

I used 3 pieces of music from people who I had a collab with, from the Hapebeast community.

  • the lighning hape music is from 0b.ETH#1393 (discord)
  • the fire hape music is from Alboz | HAPE | SIMI FC#3835 (discord)
  • the water hape music is from Alboz | HAPE | SIMI FC#3835 (discord)

This is a very early version, a prototype, so don't expect much polishing, but do expect bugs.
